author: Mosley
name: TGSCommands
description: A cog to interact with the TGStation Server API, including authentication and command execution.
install_msg: Thank you for installing TGSCommands! Use [p]tgs config to set up your TGS API connection.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores TGS API credentials (URL, username, password) in Red's Config. No other user data is stored.
